name: Vampire's Bane
description: Blast an enemy with a charge of radiant heat, dealing 1161 Flame Damage, and an additional 3346 Flame Damage over 14 seconds.  Upon activation you gain Major Savagery and Major Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by 2629.
effectLines: The damage over time lasts for longer.
